description: Cody wants you to go to a gun show and find a rare gun that Jay wanted to see.  It was an AK of some kind with a weird name… something like CARD or CORE.

dialogue.offer: Before everything went to hell Jay was talking about going to some gun show.  There was a guy there who had managed to sneak some Russian gun into the US.  It was a massive deal for Jay, it was all he could talk about.  I know it's a long shot but maybe that guy was already at the gun show?  If you find the gun you can keep it, but it would mean a lot to Jay if he could take a look all he wanted was to pull it apart and put it back together.
dialogue.accepted: Thanks.  I'll start working on an apology.
dialogue.rejected: Let me know if you change your mind.
dialogue.advice: I'd be careful there; Jay was saying they were bringing some new autonomous hardware to the show.  You're looking for a Russian rifle that should be modded to the moon.  CARD, CORE rifle, something like that.
dialogue.inquire: Any luck finding that gun show?  I think it was a Russian gun, maybe a CARD or CORE rifle?  Something like that.
dialogue.success: Thanks, darlin'.  If you could show it to Jay, that would mean a lot to me.  If there's anything I could ever make for you as payment after that, just let me know.
dialogue.success_lie: That's great!  Make sure to show it to Jay.

description: Jay wants you to go to someone's house and get some software that they had taken home.

dialogue.offer: Alright, so Cody has talked about some cutting-edge tech she's seen displayed.  This thing is called a nano-fabricator.  It's like a complicated, robotic 3D printer.  Cody used to run with some hackers that steal IP, schematics, that sort of thing.  I guess a problem they were running into was the newest tech stuff is all encrypted as templates for these printers.  Well, I know of a colleague who went home with debug software for the system.  You get that for her, and we're in business.
dialogue.accepted: Thanks.  I'll start working on an apology.
dialogue.rejected: Let me know if you change your mind.
dialogue.advice: I'd be careful.  Guy was a bit of a nut, I don't know what he was planning to do with that software.
dialogue.success: Thanks bud, I'll take it from here.  Take care of that rifle, now.
